data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gyulai, Peter, Ronkay, László, Saldaitis, Aidas (2015): Xestioplexia gen. n. with the description of a new species from China (Lepidoptera: Noctuidae). Zootaxa 4007 (1): 131-137, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4007.1.11
